item.title: Mr. Lee
item.description: DISCLAIMER: If you’re a potential future employer, this story didn’t happen - it’s a bald-faced lie; a figment of my imagination. In fact, this story wasn’t even written by a human, it was generated by GPT-3. This is a retelling of something that happened to me two years ago. Autobiographical in nature, I make no claims to the veracity nor to the journalistic integrity of what you are about to read.

item.title: About
item.description: A blog by a raving lunatic. Do not believe a word you see here; every fact is slighty wrong, every argument fallacious and every story a lie.
